title: BRIEF-S.Africa's Power Utility Eskom Says Stage 1 Rotational Loadshedding Will Continue Friday - Tweet
text:
BRIEF-S.Africa's Power Utility Eskom Says Stage 1 Rotational Loadshedding Will Continue Friday - Tweet

Commodities 3 hours ago (Oct 17, 2019 23:18)

BRIEF-S.Africa's Power Utility Eskom Says Stage 1 Rotational Loadshedding Will Continue Friday - Tweet Oct 17 (Reuters) - * S.AFRICA'S POWER UTILITY ESKOM SAYS IT STOPS LOADSHEDDING FOR THURSDAY; STAGE 1 ROTATIONAL LOADSHEDDING WILL CONTINUE FRIDAY - TWEET * S.AFRICA'S ESKOM SAYS STAGE 1 ROTATIONAL LOADSHEDDING TO CONTINUE FRIDAY FROM 0900 HRS TO 2300 HRS LOCAL TIME

BRIEF-S.Africa's Power Utility Eskom Says Stage 1 Rotational Loadshedding Will Continue Friday - Tweet
